titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODE (PROXIMAL OR DISTAL RESECTION MARGIN) - Description

div.p: MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODE (PROXIMAL OR DISTAL RESECTION MARGIN) is the same as attribute MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODE to record whether the proximal or distal resection margins were involved during an Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Care Spell.
Note: if the minimum distance from the cut margin is less than or equal to 1 mm the margin is considered "involved".
